original_text: Anyone who loves other believers shows that he is living in the light. There is nothing that will make him turn away from God.
korean_text: 그의 형제를 사랑하는 자는 빛 가운데 거하여 자기 속에 거리낌이 없으나

sentences.original_text: shows that he is living in the light
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 빛 가운데 살고 있음을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: There is nothing that will make him turn away from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 하나님에게서 떠나게 할 것은 아무것도 없습니다
